articles.content:
Why would a vitamin K deficiency make symptoms worse?
Vitamin K activates enzymes in the body that helps protect lung tissue.
When these are not activated, the lungs become poorer and can explain w… [+1095 chars]

articles.title: Tobacco Harm Reduction’s Prospects Under the Biden Administration - Filter
articles.description: Filter asked a range of experts what Biden should do about the nation's leading cause of preventable death—and what is realistic.
articles.content:
